text:
Can we add pagination for HubDB base page ?
Like - my event listing page is dynamically displaying events from HubDB and there are lost of events. I want to add pagination on that page. Is it possible ? 
We will have filters and sorting too :face_with_rolling_eyes:
you can build your own pagination on top of it either through JS or use hubl and throw query params in the address bar to identify what page you’re on
if you are meaning on the HubDB data table page thing itself then that doesn’t apply

Thanks for your prompt reply. 
I will try through JS :+1:
There are JS clients to load this data in if you look in <#CBA9UA4EN|javascript>
I wonder if this would help with the UX of the admin of hubdb
